pRuthivyantari̍kśhaM̍ dyaur-diśO&vAntaradiśAH|̍ agnir-vAqyu-rAditya-ścandramAq̍ nakśhatrAṇi|̍ Apa OśhadhayO̍ vanaspataya̍ AkAqśa AqtmA| ityadhiBUtaM|̍ | athAddhyAqtmaM| prAqṇO vyAqnO&pAqna̍ udAqnaH̍ samAqnaH|̍ cakśhuH śrOtraM manO vAk tvak| carma# mAqṃq saṅsnAvAsthi# majjA| | Eta dadhividhAyarq.̍ śhi ravOcat|̍ pA~gktaM ~MvA idaṃ sarva̱M ( )| pA~gktanaiva̍ pA~gktaṅ# spRuṇOtIti|̍ | 15 (11) anuvAkaM - 8
